name: Prima 3000 Flat Iron and 1" Curling Wand Limited Edition Set
description:
Prima flat iron is designed with cutting-edge features that redefine ease of use and excellence of performance. Curling wand is the the blue nano titanium barrel evenly distributes high heat up to 430°F to create long-lasting curls with radiant shine. The slim design is lightweight and easy to handle.

SET INCLUDES:
1 babyliss prima 3000 flat iron 1.25" and 1 babyliss curling wand 1".
WHAT IT DOES :
Prima flat iron: nano titanium plates deliver highly efficient heat transfer and instantly smooth, condition and shine, 5 led heat settings - up to 465°F.
Ion generator produces millions of ions for frizz-free shine and less static electricity, dual voltage for worldwide use, 9' swivel cord.
Curling wand: nano titanium technology, digital temperature control. Even heat distribution, gentler styling and heats up to 430°F.
HOW TO USE :
Flat iron: clamp a thin, 1" wide section of hair between the plates, slowly glide the iron from roots to ends.
Curling wand: begin with dry detangled hair, divide hair at the temples and secure the top half out of the way.
Then divide the bottom half into 1 to 2" sections to begin styling, hold the wand over your head with the tip pointing downward and wrap a section of hair around the barrel.
Finish with the end of the section against the barrel tip. Hold for a few seconds then slide the wand out to release the wave.

Brushes feature fun sparkly blue handles and gold-tone ferrules with the Disney princess logo and Cinderella silhouette printed on them.
Includes a matching beauty bag that can hold all the brushes and additional products.
HOW TO USE - F80 flat kabuki - blend liquid and cream products. F10 powder and blush - precisely apply powder products. E40 tapered blending - soften and blend harsh lines.
HOW TO USE - E55 eye shading - evenly apply color across the lid. E30 pencil - soften liner along the lash lines. Beauty bag - chic storage for touch-ups on the go.
F80 flat kabuki, F10 powder blush, E40 tapered blending, E55 eye shading, E30 and pencil beauty bag.
Exclusive synthetic prevents bacteria fibers engineered to better hold, apply and blend products.
Durable and corrosion-resistant Sigma alloy precious metal plating for shine and strength exclusive, patented interlocking technology double-threaded engineering.
With Sigma's patented water-resistant technology and ultra-soft synthetic fibers, this high-quality brush set will work magic, believe it or not.
WARRANTY - If you purchased a sigma beauty brush, sigma spa brush cleansing tool, sigma dry'n shape tower.
WARRANTY - Sigma beauty brush storage from our authorized retailers, and that beauty tool fails due to a manufacturing defect, we will, at our discretion, replace it. Refunds will not be issued for manufacturing defects.
WARRANTY - If the exact replacement product is not available, we will provide a similar product of comparable value. Stock available on SigmaBeauty.Com or at retailers may not reflect the stock available for replacements.

name: Vibrant Make Up
description:
Add some color to your daily routine with our Vibrant Make Up products. Made with natural ingredients, these products will enhance your natural beauty without harming your skin.

Choose from a variety of colors and finishes, including matte, shimmer, and metallic.

Cruelty-free and vegan-friendly.

Made in the USA.
size and fit: Available in various sizes.
Materials and care: Natural ingredients. Refer to individual product labels for specific instructions.
